name: Certero
overview: Certero is a leading specialist in Software Asset Management, PC Power Management (PCPM) and Password Reset solutions and services. It was set up in 2007 and is headquartered in Warrington, UK, with offices in Sydney, Australia, and partners across the globe. The firm aims to provide innovative solutions to help customers drive out complexities and costs across the IT spectrum with a rapid return on investment. Certero is a Microsoft partner with three “Gold” competencies in Software Asset Management, Independent Software Vendor (ISV) and Data Platform as well as an Oracle Gold Partner and Symantec Partner. The firm’s software solutions are deployed in a total of 32 countries.
